channel.title: Legendware
channel.description: Legendware | Unique products for visual game modification

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
‚óè Main
Increased inject speed.
Fixed various crashes.
Fixed various bugs.

‚óè Rage
Improved aim stability.
Reworked resolver.
Added automatic stop modifiers.
Added force body aim if lethal option.
Now hide shots works with fake lag (limited to 6 ticks).
Fixed various bugs.

‚óè Visuals
Added inferno indicator option.
Added smoke indicator option.
Added bomb timer option.
Added grenade warning.
Fixed various bugs.

‚óè Misc
Fixed various bugs with automatic peek.
Added anti-untrusted option...

Read more

item.title: My honest Legendware review
item.author: invalid@example.com (JCat)
item.dc:creator: JCat
item.content:encoded:
Intro:
I've first joined lw early 2020 just before v2 release and back then the cheat performed ok against other p2c. Now v4 had many different changes that has improved the cheat a lot since I last used it.

Menu:
The menu back in v2 felt unoriginal, but clean. With v4 they have changed the design entirely, with the new menu being easy to navigate and use. It is probably one of the best menu designs I've seen.
10/10

Visuals:
The visual customization is as usual...

Read more

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
Cheat
  • Added anti-backshoot on manual shooting.
  • Improved yaw anti-aim correction.
  • Reworked anti-aim direction system.
  • Limited fake lag limit on valve servers.
  • Added choke indicator.
  • Added key bind on edge jump.
  • Fixed various bugs.

item.title: hwid reset request
item.author: invalid@example.com (edipulaaa)
item.dc:creator: edipulaaa
item.content:encoded: can i please get a hwid reset? i was trying to play with lw then it crashed and i tried to load it then it crashed and said that i don't have the same hwid as before please guys, i really love legendware, most of the time i am playing hvh with this cheat that i am considering it very nice and today i cannot play with it.. please guys, just please.

item.author: invalid@example.com (Immortale)
item.dc:creator: Immortale
item.content:encoded:
‚óè Main
Multithreading support has been temporarily removed (for reworking).
Fixed crashes related to loading some Lua scripts.
Fixed crashes related to recent game update.
Fixed various bugs.

‚óè Rage
Improved aim stability.
Improved various bugs.

‚óè Anti-aim
Added flick.

Also, 7 bonus days were added to all users with an active subscription. Soon we will be able to please you with a larger update of the cheat and the site, stay tuned!

item.title: Honest legendware review
item.author: invalid@example.com (abitarend)
item.dc:creator: abitarend
item.content:encoded:
Rage: 2/10 ( update cheat lazy monkey @Immortale )
Antiaim: 8/10 ( basic, nothing much )
Legit: 10/10 ( veri gud veri nice but you get untrusted ban somehow )
Visuals: 9/10 ( Nice but not optimised )
Misc: 10/10 ( Nothing to say )
Skins: 9/10 ( missing music kits, pins )
Configs: 8/10 ( it's not that easy to use )
Scripts: 6/10

item.author: invalid@example.com (aiwww7)
item.dc:creator: aiwww7

item.title: my opinion of Legendware v4
item.author: invalid@example.com (ONyxNato)
item.dc:creator: ONyxNato
item.content:encoded:
After months of using this cheat, I can give my well-formed and structured opinion about it.

Let's start with the menu because it is with this that you have access to all the cheat functions.

The menu is quite simple, intuitive, and well structured and its organization by subdivisions ends up facilitating access to all the functions that the cheat has.

The menu is very good considering the price of the cheat, as there are several more expensive cheats in which the menu is quite confusing...

Read more
